subtitleNullable: One .txt file per cuisine of interest
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I built this dataset from [yelp.com/dataset](yelp.com/dataset) by merging files Review.json and Business.json. Each Yelp business is tagged to certain categories/cuisines. For each cuisine of interest, I took a subset of this merged data so that I could combine all text reviews for that cuisine into a single text file.

Steps to arrive at this data from Yelp data are on the [Github Repository](https://github.com/Spatika/Cuisine-Recommendation-Yelp-Data)

### Content

Each file is of the format cuisine_name.txt
Each file contains all the newline-separated text reviews from any business that has that cuisine in its list of categories
This means if a business has both 'American' and 'Burgers' in its categories attribute, you will see those reviews in both of these text files

### Acknowledgements

yelp.com/dataset

### Inspiration

What are customer sentiments for each of these cuisines?
Are any of the cuisines similar (or at least get similar text reviews)?
